getDbAdapter

public static DbAdapter getDbAdapter(Context ctx)

open

public DbAdapter open()
               throws SQLException
Open the skinObserver database. If it cannot be opened, try to create a new instance of the database. If it cannot be created, throw an exception to signal the failure

Returns:
this (self reference, allowing this to be chained in an initialization call)
Throws:
SQLException - if the database could be neither opened or created

public void close()

addPhoto

public int addPhoto(java.lang.String location,
                    java.sql.Timestamp timeStamp,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String annotation)
Add a new photo entry using the location, timeStamp and name provided. If the new photo entry is successfully added, return the new PHOTOID for that entry, otherwise return -1 to indicate failure.

Returns:
PHOTOID or -1 if failed

addGroup

public int addGroup(java.lang.String name)
Add a new group entry using the name provided. If the new group entry is successfully added, return the new GROUPID for that entry, otherwise return -1 to indicate failure.

Returns:
GROUPID or -1 if failed

addSkinCondition

public int addSkinCondition(java.lang.String name)
Add a new skin condition entry using the name provided. If the new skin condition entry is successfully added, return the new SKINCONDITIONID for that entry, otherwise return -1 to indicate failure.

Returns:
SKINCONDITIONID or -1 if failed

addPhotoGroup

public int addPhotoGroup(int photoId,
                         int groupId)
Add a new photo - group entry using the PHOTOID and GROUPID provided. If the new photo - group entry is successfully added, return the row id for that entry, otherwise return -1 to indicate failure.

Returns:
row id or -1 if failed

                                 int skinConditionId)

Returns:
row id or -1 if failed

updatePhoto

public int updatePhoto(int photoId,
                       java.lang.String newLocation,
                       java.sql.Timestamp newTimeStamp,
                       java.lang.String newName,
                       java.lang.String newAnnotation)
Update the row specified by photoId in the photo table with new information for the photo.

Parameters:
photoId - photo id of the photo to be updated
newLocation - new location for the photo. Passing null keeps the current location
newTimeStamp. - Passing null keeps the current timestamp
newName. - Passing null keeps the current name
newAnnotation. - Passing null keeps the current annotation
Returns:
the number of rows affected.

Parameters:
photoId - the id of the photo in interest.
option - OptionType.PHOTOGROUP for removing all connections between the photo and groups OptionType.PHOTOSKIN for removing all connections between the photo and skin conditions.

fetchAllContainersOfAPhoto

public Cursor fetchAllContainersOfAPhoto(int photoId,
                                         OptionType option)
fetch all containers associated with the indicated photo. option = OptionType. PHOTOGROUP for retrieving all groups associated with the photo, option = OptionType.PHOTOSKIN for retrieving all skin conditions associated with the photo.

Parameters:
photoId - the id of the photo
option - OptionType.PHOTOGROUP for retrieving all groups associated with the photo OptionType.PHOTOSKIN for retrieving all skin conditions associated with the photo.
Returns:

fetchAllPhotosOfAContainer

public Cursor fetchAllPhotosOfAContainer(int containerId,
                                         OptionType option)
fetch all photos associated with the indicated container ( group or skin condition ). table = PHOTOGROUP_TALBE for retrieving all photos associated with the group, table = PHOTOSKIN_TABLE for retrieving all photos associated with the skin condition.

Parameters:
containerId -
table -
Returns:
